publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2326 Robert Brown: Importance of the Construction Industry-That the Parliament notes the importance of the construction industry to the Scottish economy and the public and the prevalence of unqualified "cowboy firms" in the industry; calls upon Her Majesty's Government to make use of annex K of EU Directive 77/388/EEC to reduce the rate of VAT on repair work to 5%, and further calls upon Her Majesty's Government to introduce a statutory registration scheme incorporating an insurance-based guarantee of work with respect to building firms.
